website_summaries.verdict: Super option for action footage. Compact and durable.
pros: A compact, impact-resistant 4K camera made to be taken anywhere
The HERO8 includes a 3.5-millimetre mic adapter for high-quality audio recording
TimeWarp 2.0 produces incredible slow motion video in 4K
cons: Requires an update out of the box to fix some image stabilisation and freezing issues

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, but not perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Worthwhile upgrade from a Hero 5 but not without some shortcomings. Video quality is excellent and stabilisation remarkable, delivering buttery smooth images while hurtling down the side of a mountain. The integrated folding mounting ears are a great improvement over the cases and frames required with older models Less good is the non-replaceable lens cover and the silly battery door which frequently detaches itself whilst attempting to plug in the cable. The latter is, I understand, to allow a ‘mod’ device to be attached although this removes the waterproof rating of the camera rendering it somewhat pointless for my purposes. If you own a Hero 7 (or perhaps 6) maybe wait a year and see what the 9 brings.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: First dip in the pool 1m depths doors fully closed. Have had go pros for years so i am sure! Water damge water inside everywhere camera gone. Ps. And a actually purchased a case for scuba diving to take it deep in Egypt and it broke in my backyard pool. Not cool
customer_reviews.author: michal

customer_reviews.title: GoPro 8
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced, it says that camera is waterproof but my Gopro stopped work after I use on rain stopped working now I can’t return I lost almost 400 £ never buy this Gopro 😤😔
customer_reviews.author: Antônio J.

customer_reviews.title: It just works
customer_reviews.text: And it works well, I was surprised at how good the 4k image quality from this tiny cam is, the sound directly from the inbuilt mic isn't too shabby either, I'm waiting on the Media Mod which makes adding an off cam mic really easy and as I already have the tiny Rode wireless go and their excellent lav mic I can capture the sound attached to my subject allowing for professional audio recording. The cam also does slow motion and supports lots of codecs and while it can't compare with my Panny GH5 it costs a fraction of the price while offering almost as good stabilisation too. Don't hesitate to buy this great little cam 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Jimathome

customer_reviews.title: Updating from hero7
customer_reviews.text: Not keen on the fixed lens,unlike the gopro 7,which could be replaced easily.Apart from that,it hasn't crashed yet,unlike the 7,which was great,but crashed a lot (it never lost a file though).The 8 software seems a little more precise and quick.The bitrate can be adjusted to a higher level without using protune. Never update the firmware via the app/wifi, it will look successful, but the horizon levelling won't work properly.Put the memory card into a pc,and load it.The horizon level is great,makes it virtually like a gimbal.So far so good.Update-strange pulsing in and out on some shots,sometimes the app horizon levelling doesn't work,or makes it worse
customer_reviews.author: mdj

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this during Christmas offer and got lucky coz it came with shorty, head strap, and a spare battery. I used this go pro 8 everywhere when I went on holiday in Italy for Christmas and new year. I used this almost everyday. This a great camera with lots of media power. Eg 4K @ 30pfs and 1080 @ 60fps. The function is very easy to use and I am in love with this camera. Just a quick thing to note is the battery. Make sure you have few extra pair of batteries coz I believe of it’s high resolution media the battery doesn’t last long. But it’s a small device with small battery. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: John S

customer_reviews.title: Performance not acceptable for the price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this camera for my ski holiday in Finland, the camera was not lasting more than 10 minutes before shutting down. Sold for extreme sports and then when it comes to recording a few videos I am not able to do it because it is too cold for the camera to work and the battery dropped from 80% to 3% in a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Bonzi

customer_reviews.title: Huge disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Such a huge disappointment everything about this camera sucks - the latest problem I have just run into is the camera loses battery overnight despite being switched off. I'll look into this once I have fixed the other issues e.g phone cant connect to the camera etc had the thing 3 days so far.
customer_reviews.author: Hitchslap101

customer_reviews.title: Great little action camera!
customer_reviews.text: Battery life could be better but I love my new GoPro Hero8. The pictures are so clear and video clips smooth (not jumpy) and lovely. I’m learning lots of things about it but generally it’s easy to pick up information via YouTube or the GoPro app. The instructions with the camera leave a lot to be desired! I’m enjoying experimenting with all the settings. The app is good too, even though it has some bad reviews. There’s so much to learn with this camera but its size makes it a great camera to use in lots of different situations.
customer_reviews.author: sleighbell

customer_reviews.title: Timewarp is magnificent
customer_reviews.text: Gopro 8 purchased for the new Time Warp capabilities and I wasn't disappointed at all. I can now record walks that are incredibly smooth and stable at x15 speed in camera (on a chest harness) and they are superb straight out of the can. 4k great colour new fitting system does away with the cage which is a bonus, I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: Smooth, but can NOT recommend
customer_reviews.text: So, let me start with the good parts. What I can say is that the image stabilization is incredible, BUT.... the focus, especially during the night is very bad, also the thing that I really don`t like - battery life - terrible! If you have an iPhone XS or newer version, or Samsung NOTE 10 or S10, you will see how much worse is the GoPro. I will have to return it and continue with my iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Koksi

customer_reviews.title: My First Action camera
customer_reviews.text: Been testing it now in past 3 weeks and setting up presets the 5GHZ is a bit unpredictable few times where i have to switch to 2.4 only been using while cycling it's great no more abuse from drivers now i can clock and report i also caught some females skinny dipping in the heatwave they knew gopro was rolling ofc i can't upload it and reuse it but moments like that you can treasure.
customer_reviews.author: Jayc

customer_reviews.title: Would you buy a car where the steering wheel came as an extra?
customer_reviews.text: Gopro Hero8: Poor design quality regarding durability and ease of use. Delivered with no memory card so cannot check operation until purchaesd card. Memory card difficult to remove and battery life poor. Accessories overpriced and all round a bit of a rip off. I would not buy another since this device has very limited application for any professional. OK as a toy.
customer_reviews.author: lynns23

customer_reviews.title: review  tjhis  pruduct  before  you  bye  it
customer_reviews.text: got this today it wont work properly it over heats wont except sd cards not very happy .
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Best action cam
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of POV, wide angled videos and all the stuff with the GoPro and this model in particular is the best one for all your activities. I do sports and suits me perfectly to record everything, it has multiple options and profiles soo you can change depending on your rec style. The battery is not a big thing, but enough to record a lot of stuff using the highest quality profiles, it is very intuitive and as a GoPro very portable. I’m very happy to get this on my birthday, nothing to complain, if you are thinking to buy one, just go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Cayo Lucchesi

customer_reviews.title: Video and Audio quality
customer_reviews.text: I love the GoPro. I had used a Gopro 6 on a production in SE Asia. First time using one (as I am only a photographer) and that was brilliant. Bought this product as I have a good number of productions coming up. The video and audio quality is brilliant. The image stabilization is amazing and ten times better than that of the 6. This action camera has all the bells and whistles. I would suggest buying a body cover as well as a screen and lens protector. I'd also suggest watching a few Youtube vids to fully understand the vast amount of amazing features on this action camera. No one will be disappointed in purchasing the GoPro Hero 8.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: GoPro HERO8 Black Bundle
customer_reviews.text: This is the best action camera currently on the market with exceptional capabilities in various different situations, including water. I bought a couple of after market screen covers but found the touch control on the rear screen was compromised so have now removed. Other than that, it's brilliant. Recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: mrchattyuk

customer_reviews.title: Better, but same old GoPro problems
customer_reviews.text: Hypersmooth is amazing, but it still suffers from overheating and poor battery life Great if you are doing an active sport outdoors Useless if you use it locked off indoors, it will overheat and stop in around 20 mins if you are on any of the high res/high frame rate modes
customer_reviews.author: C. J. Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: I knew this gopro was good but after using it for myself and actually seeing all the features and everything for myself I was blown away even more. The image stability is out of this world and I found it easy to connect to my phone and see what the angel is for riding my bike. I know it's easier to connect to iPhones but I use a android and it still didn't take too long to set up and doesn't take too long to connect everytime. I only bought 1 for now but will 100% definitely get more for more angles and better footage.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I had the hero 5 and jumped in to this regarding some false reviews love it been to Thailand and some great footage bought screen protectors for lense and rear screen due to the lense not being replaceable recommend you get screen protectors
customer_reviews.author: Darren preston

customer_reviews.title: Theres a reason its the best!
customer_reviews.text: If you are thinmking of buying a cheap Apeman or other ty camera don't. Just buy this. ave up and buy this. This camera actually has CLEAR SOUND which the other cheaop cameras just don't have. PLus better pixture quality. And better abttery life.
customer_reviews.author: firewhippet

customer_reviews.title: Corrupted Camera Recording
customer_reviews.text: While there was so much potential and so much to like about the GoPro the camera was unusable due to corrupted video recording. On playback the image jumps, turns green in places and shudders like an old-school 1980s VHS! I suspected the SD card was at fault (A1) but after purchasing two A1 Ultra SD cards the issue continued suggesting either a hardware or software fault. Supremely disappointed and at £350 a very painful purchase. Can I recommend the product? In a word: no.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Camera & Quality
customer_reviews.text: a fantastic camera and quality video. its fully waterproof therefore no need for any extra covers and no more muffled sound from the casing. smooth playback when i take it with me to racing and no jittering and shaking whatsoever. im gald i bought one!
customer_reviews.author: Ahmer M

customer_reviews.title: Battery life
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera let down by poor battery life. It may just be mine though as I dont see any comments about this anywhere else. Filming at 1080 at 60fps, I got 45 minutes of continual footage off a 68 percent charge.
customer_reviews.author: Rennur Yeytiw

customer_reviews.title: The best GoPro so far.
customer_reviews.text: I've owned 4 GoPros over the years, from the Hero 5, 6 and the 7. This latest iteration, Hero 8 Black is simply the best among them all ( until the next edition in the future at least). Battery life, ease.of use and video qualities are superb. Can't wait to take this baby for a spin.
customer_reviews.author: cesar neri

customer_reviews.title: Very good but software not compatibile with all computers
customer_reviews.text: Overall very good camera. Please research prior to purchase as there is some software issue and camera does not work with some of the pcs, dies not connect snd you need card reader to transfer your files! GoPro is aware but does nothing about it.
customer_reviews.author: Magdalena

customer_reviews.title: No issues
customer_reviews.text: I can’t see why people say the GoPro 8 isn’t waterproof I take mine on water sporting events all the time it has been in the water countless amounts of times and still works perfectly, no misting or faults. As for the GoPro app it is really helpful for when I have the GoPro mounted at the end of my kayak to use my phone to do recordings and change settings.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: The GoPro is amazing. The video quality is stunning and my partner has taken it on the water and out with the dogs a few times and produced some brilliant footage. I recommend this to anyone thinking of getting one.
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t work after only one recording.. problems we’ll known to GoPro.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this GoPro, used it once (even had problems with getting it to continuous record without pausing), then it refused to charge, overheated when trying and then decided it won’t switch on. Searched online and found a torrent of complaints with similar problems to mine. This device seems to have been launched with a whole raft of gremlins. Would not recommend buying. GoPro spend a fortune on advertising something that doesn’t always work.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Malcolm

customer_reviews.title: Poor battery performance
customer_reviews.text: The camera is fantastic , but If I have to shoot away from home, I need pocket full of batteries, at least 10 pieces, and that almost doubles the cost of the camera
customer_reviews.author: George Fajnburg

customer_reviews.title: Poor faulty
customer_reviews.text: Camera did not work had faults connecting to phone for control .
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Tj Brown

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product from a tested manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: Had a Go pro hero 3 and still working fine so naturally upgraded to latest model Hero 8. Love it and I hope this will last like my old Hero 3. Lovey it’s latest mods and cons I think it’s a terrific bit of kit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Go pro 8
customer_reviews.text: Only had for a short time. Taking a while to get used to however that's because of my age and not the product. Seems to be doing what it says so far.
customer_reviews.author: Andy scott

customer_reviews.title: Bought new, arrived looking used
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item described as new, when it arrived the box was scratched badly and the cardboard torn. looking at the camera, it had scratches on the body and the screen protectors removed! I have had to send this back!
customer_reviews.author: Emma Mason

customer_reviews.title: go pro
customer_reviews.text: I had a GoPro Hero 4 that I've been using fairly happily over the past few years when going to the ski It has held up very well and I'd never had a problem with it, but the audio was fairly poor and compared to modern YouTube videos my footage was starting to look a little dated. I decided it was time to upgrade. the best one until now!
customer_reviews.author: elena sprenger

customer_reviews.title: Refund handled well.
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving this product a good mark for the way the problem was dealt with. After one tiny use, it died, never to work again. Packaged it all up (crying) and returned it. Refund sorted very quickly. Just one of those things. Bought another works brilliantly.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Diddle

customer_reviews.title: Great picture/fantastic stabilisation/poor battery
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality is great as you can expect from GoPro brand, however the bariery life is poor. Even with GPS and other extras off, you need a few spare batteries. Another minus is non replacable lens cover but all in all It is a great product. Even if its not a perfect camera, the stabilisation is worth every penny. I have tested in on mtb and the results are fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Bartosz Kaminski

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, it’s the best, no questions. Cheaper copy versions available but... I have both but I only use my GoPro
customer_reviews.author: cleandirt

customer_reviews.title: Battery runs out fast
customer_reviews.text: Battery runs out very fast in m y opinion that the cons that i have with this camera apart from that i like it compare to the Gopro Max ( the image quality on Hero 8 looks better and has more features though i will miss the mics and the 360 degrees videos on Max)The delivery was fast. I am impressed, over all im impressed with the services. thank you :)
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Go Pro Hero 8.
customer_reviews.text: Great graphics.Feels. sturdy.Well made.Simple to use. Great pictures.Excellent value.Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Robert K.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: We love this camera, small, good pictures, easy to be used, and easy to carry everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it sometimes unlucky
customer_reviews.text: This GOPro 8 was an Used item wasn’t happy when went holiday ruined my family photos and videos shouldn’t have brought used one rather than brand new much gutted had to borrow friends smart phone for family holiday photography 😢
customer_reviews.author: Mr. W. Holbrook

customer_reviews.title: Great picture quality
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting this camera for a while already and couldn’t decide should I buy it or no. On first day when I saw how easy it is to use the camera and how good the picture quality was it was just amazing. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Romans

customer_reviews.title: Lack of support is criminal
customer_reviews.text: GoPro have lost the plot. Not bad while it works but if anything goes wrong you are in deep trouble. Support is non-existent even if you've got the paid GoPro plus subscription. No idea how GoPro a still in business. Avoid like the plague
customer_reviews.author: steven

customer_reviews.title: Battery life not great
customer_reviews.text: I use this for vlogging. The quality is perfect. Only difficulty I have is I will need to purchase a battery charger for on the go because it doesn’t last long at all
customer_reviews.author: T B

customer_reviews.title: Top banana
customer_reviews.text: Another development in the hero range and a leap forward in video
customer_reviews.author: A R.

customer_reviews.title: Nice !
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic picture quality! Easy to use and not bad price
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: video stabilization
customer_reviews.text: easy to use however the battery does not last for 2 hours straight hours of use
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: The name of the product says it all. Another successful product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it. Looks great looking forward to see it in action.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: batteries never enough
customer_reviews.text: I need to have enough spare batteries never charge to send the speed is great
customer_reviews.author: didem

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent picture quality and feels much better than previous models. Much easier to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Go get it

customer_reviews.title: Loving time lapse
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use on the bike but with what’s going on I’m using it for timelapse and finding the most entertaining. Good so far batteries on GoPro is not that good so will be buying another battery soon
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera!
customer_reviews.text: I had a reasonable expection of the performance of this camera but it has far exceeded it. The image quality is excellent and I'm oreally impressed with the clarity of the microphones. Would happily purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: James Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Still on the process of testing it, but so far is incredible. Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Gian Luigi Granieri

customer_reviews.title: Great and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: As always great product from gopro with short battery life. Would definitely consider buying couple of extra batteries when purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Demian

customer_reviews.title: Very good deal
customer_reviews.text: This was a great black Friday deal good value for money. Great solid product with extras. Yet to put it through its paces but would imagine like all gopro cameras it will be amazing with great picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Lilleker

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: That's was for a present and I can't say anything about this product
customer_reviews.author: Ivy

customer_reviews.text: I love the camera as a whole it's got some great functions & Great picture & sound
customer_reviews.author: Warjun

customer_reviews.title: Amazing picture
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my partner, who has used it on his bmx-spree, cycling and general picture taking. Amazing picture, and fantastic stability; completely durable. 100% recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Lake

customer_reviews.title: Happy son happy mom
customer_reviews.text: Brought for my sons 40th birthday he was over the moon, quick delivery and a good deal
customer_reviews.author: pink cow

customer_reviews.title: MTB perfect
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, brought as a present and my boyfriend loves it- he goes mountain biking!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: unsure
customer_reviews.text: do know how to if this is how the screen should be as never had one before, and does the screen it damaged
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gopro
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the fact they come with no sd card and spare batteries other wise all perfect
customer_reviews.author: Abdelghafour

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!! satisfaction, I recommend 2.7K 120fps recording, battery life 50 min
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: GoPro is 1st Class
customer_reviews.text: It’s fantastic.. Still learning but so far it’s great.. Can’t wait to take it on my next trip away.
customer_reviews.author: Reese

customer_reviews.title: Great HDR
customer_reviews.text: Crazy how these small cameras can capture extremely good video!
customer_reviews.author: David Beddall

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: The best action camera. The hyper smooth feature is ridiculously good!
customer_reviews.author: marge

product_meta.title: GoPro HERO8 Black - Waterproof Action Camera with Touch Screen 4K Ultra HD Video 12MP Photos 1080p Live Streaming Stabilization (International Model)
product_meta.description: This is HERO8 Black—the most versatile, unshakable HERO camera ever.
feature_bullets: HyperSmooth 2.0: HERO8 Black has three levels of stabilization – On, High and Boost
Streamlined Design: The re-imagined shape is more pocketable, and folding fingers at the base let you swap mounts quickly.
Expandable Mods: Vloggers, pro filmmakers and aspiring creators can do more than ever imagined with our HERO8 Black mods (sold separately).
Live Streaming in 1080p: Share while you’re there.
TimeWarp 2.0: Capture super-stabilized time lapse videos while moving through an activity.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars728 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
